metadata.title: CVE-2011-4203 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in calendar/set.php in the Calendar componentin Moodle 1.9.x before 1.9.15, 2.0.x before 2.0.6, 2.1.x before 2.1.3, and2.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conductHTTP response splitting attacks via vectors involving the url variable.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
